GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles, sorted in descending order by created_at date

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves article with corresponding id to input

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves comments on articles that correspond with the input id

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts comments on articles that correspond with the input id

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves article objects withh votes property altered
